SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.Game
public class Game extends Object
This class represents the game instance of the MyShelfie board game. It manages the game state, players, board, decks, and the flow of the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Game(int gameId, int maxPlayers)
    Constructs a new Game instance with the specified game ID and maximum number of players.
    Game(GameStatusToFile gameStatus, ArrayList<PlayerStatusToFile> playerStatus)
    Constructs a new Game instance based on a saved game status and player statuses.

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game(int gameId, int maxPlayers) throws MaxNumberOfPlayersException, IOException
      Constructs a new Game instance with the specified game ID and maximum number of players.
      Parameters:
      gameId - the ID of the game
      maxPlayers - the maximum number of players
      Throws:
      MaxNumberOfPlayersException - if the maximum number of players is invalid
      IOException - if there is an error loading the board configuration file

    • Game

      public Game(GameStatusToFile gameStatus, ArrayList<PlayerStatusToFile> playerStatus)
      Constructs a new Game instance based on a saved game status and player statuses.
      Parameters:
      gameStatus - the saved game status
      playerStatus - the list of saved player statuses

  • Method Details

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerID) throws AlreadyStartedGameException
      Adds a player to the game by creating a new Player object and adding it to the list of players.
      Parameters:
      playerID - the ID of the player to be added
      Throws:
      AlreadyStartedGameException - if the game has already started

    • nextPlayer

      public void nextPlayer() throws FinishedGameException, GameNotStartedException
      Advances the current player to the next player in the turn order.
      Throws:
      FinishedGameException - if the game has already finished
      GameNotStartedException - if the game has not yet started

    • initializeBoard

      public void initializeBoard()
      Initializes the game board by placing items on the board tiles. This method is called only once at the beginning of the game.

    • initializeDeck

      public void initializeDeck() throws IOException
      Initializes the game decks (item deck, personal goal deck, and common goal deck). This method is called only once at the beginning of the game.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the deck configuration files

    • initializeGame

      public void initializeGame() throws IOException
      Initializes the game by calling the methods to initialize the decks and the board.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an error loading the deck configuration files

    • startGame

      public void startGame()
      Starts the game by setting the game state to running.

    • refreshBoard

      public void refreshBoard()
      Checks if the board needs to be refreshed and refreshes it if necessary. This method is called every round.

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn() throws FinishedGameException, GameNotStartedException
      Advances the game to the next turn by calling the nextPlayer method.
      Throws:
      FinishedGameException - if the game has already finished
      GameNotStartedException - if the game has not yet started

      public GameState getGameState()
      Returns the current game state.

      the current game state

      public PersonalGoal getPersonalGoal(String playerId) throws MissingPlayerException
      Returns the personal goal of the player with the specified ID.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player
      Returns:
      the personal goal of the player
      Throws:
      MissingPlayerException - if the player is not found in the game

      Returns:
      an array indicating whether each common goal has already been achieved
